thread.section_title: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals | smokymtndreams.com
thread.title: Andrew
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Andrew

author: Andrew
title: Andrew
text: I went to rent a cabin and upon checkout this company added more than 50% of the list price in fees. $100 cleaning fee for having 2 dogs. Complete ripoff. If the place is considered pet friendly include pet cleaning fees in the list price. I will never use this pace again.
